main event: A round, baseball-sized object was observed emitting a sudden white flash trail in the sky near Plattsburgh Air Force Base, New York.
interesting points: The object appeared to be about 2-3 feet in size and was described as round.
The object was observed while the witness was stopped at an intersection in their car.
The object moved in the sky, changing direction from westerly to southerly and then northerly before disappearing.
Subsequent investigation provided no conclusive information about the identity of the object.
The case was classified as 'INCOMPLETE' by the Air Force investigation.
sighted object: a round, baseball-sized object with a sudden white flash trail
location: Plattsburgh Air Force Base, New York
